nodes.text: The Spice Triangle was the region of the Mid Rim and the Outer Rim Territories delimited by the Corellian Run, the Triellus Trade Route and the Death Wind Corridor.
It contained worlds particularly involved in the spice trade. The most prominent were Tatooine, Roon and Ryloth.
The Spice Triangle was likely named after the Golden Triangle: one of the real-world's main opium-producing areas.
